name: Nebula
description: is a powerful and user-friendly navigation app.
You can easily plan and track your travels through space, whether you're a seasoned astronaut or a space exploration enthusiast.
With real-time updates and detailed maps, helps you stay on course and reach your destination with ease.

features.title: Space Travel
features.body: Plan and track your space travels using detailed maps and real-time updates.

features.title: Destination Tracker
features.body: View your current location and track your progress towards your destination.

features.title: Journey Alerts
features.body: Set alerts for important events or landmarks along your journey.

features.title: Map Customization
features.body: Customize your map display with different themes and overlays.
